name: ESPRESSO RISTRETTO
basicInfo: Delightfully short for a bolder fuller flavour.

name: GRANDE INTENSO
basicInfo: A mug of bold, full-bodied coffee – enjoy with or without milk.

name: LUNGO INTENSO
basicInfo: The more intense version of the 'stretched' espresso. Enjoy with or without milk.

name: MARRAKESH STYLE TEA
basicInfo: A blend of aromatic green tea, intensely flavourful and refreshing mint, topped with NESCAFÉ® Dolce Gusto’s infamous mousse and sweetened to perfection.

name: MOCHA
basicInfo: Rich coffee with a delightful chocolate twist.

name: CHOCOCINO
basicInfo: A pure hit of devilishly creamy hot chocolate.

name: LATTE MACCHIATO
basicInfo: Steamed frothy milk on a layer of smooth, aromatic, full-bodied espresso.
